citations.narrative:
The enclosures housing 6 black-and-white ruffed lemur, 1 brown lemur and an enclosure housing 1 greater bushbaby had
electrical wires in the enclosures. Unprotected electrical wires in enclosures pose a rick of shock, electrocution, and
strangulation. The electrical wires need to be oriented in such a way that the animals cannot interact with them.
Correct by April 9, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.75(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
The enclosures housing 6 black-and-white ruffed lemur, 1 brown lemur and an enclosure housing 1 greater bushbaby had 
electrical wires in the enclosures. Unprotected electrical wires in enclosures pose a rick of shock, electrocution, and 
strangulation. The electrical wires need to be oriented in such a way that the animals cannot interact with them. 
Correct by April 9, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
